text: The Shocking Miss Pilgrim is a 1947 American musical comedy movie directed by George Seaton and starring Betty Grable, Dick Haymes, Anne Revere, Gene Lockhart, Elizabeth Patterson, Allyn Joslyn, Arthur Shields, Charles Kemper, Elisabeth Risdon, Marilyn Monroe. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was a box office disappointment. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 comedy movies Category:1947 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by George Seaton
title: The Shocking Miss Pilgrim
